title: Ether
description: A month ago Becka Pierce was dead. And then she got better.All she remembers is seeing a beautiful boy in the white ether between life and death. He led her back to her body and now she’s different.Ephraim is a benevolent, flirtatious and protective spirit. He didn’t just give Becka back her life, he gave her something to live for. But seeing him comes with a price because Becka can also see darker spirits. They followed her back. Now Ephraim's all the protection she has against an incorporeal evil capable of possessing anyone, even her close friends.
author: Dana Michelle Belle
